about_the_game:
This bundle contains the official game guide, artbook, and digital wallpaper collection for The Spanish Privateer.

Game Guide

The official game guide to The Spanish Privateer, comprising of shortcut guides to achieve each ending as quickly as possible, and an in-depth spreadsheet for those who want to explore every option.

Artbook

The artbook contains progress artwork, guest art, and comments on characters, character design, historical facts, and more.

Wallpaper Collection

This collection contains the full resolution images for CGs and promotional artwork for use as wallpapers.

Installation

Right-click "The Spanish Privateer", click Manage>Browse Local Files. The contents of the bundle are in the "TSP Digital Bundle" folder. Access the "Wallpapers" folder for wallpapers, "TSP Route Guide.pdf" for the game guide, and "TSP Digital Artbook.pdf" for the artbook. "TSP Route Guide Accessibility Version" .doc and .odt provide an option for users who wish to change the font, font sizes, etc. The "TSP Point System Spreadsheet.pdf" and "TSP Point System.xlsx" provide complete information to the point system for every choice.
